channel.title: Guns on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Guns on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Right-Wing Activists Are Targeting People for Allegedly Celebrating Charlie Kirk's Death
item.description: Extremists and an anonymously run website are posting identifying details about people accused of celebrating Charlie Kirk’s murder online. Some of those targeted are now getting death threats.

item.title: Right-Wing Activists Are Targeting People for Allegedly Celebrating Charlie Kirk's Death
item.description: Extremists and an anonymously run website are posting identifying details about people accused of celebrating Charlie Kirk’s murder online. Some of those targeted are now getting death threats.

item.title: ‘War Is Here’: The Far-Right Responds to Charlie Kirk Shooting With Calls for Violence
item.description: Prominent far-right figures and elected officials have called for vengeance following the death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: ‘War Is Here’: The Far-Right Responds to Charlie Kirk Shooting With Calls for Violence
item.description: Prominent far-right figures and elected officials have called for vengeance following the death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: Right-Wing Activist Charlie Kirk Dead at 31
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk died after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

item.title: Right-Wing Activist Charlie Kirk Dead at 31
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk died after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Is Dead After Utah Valley University Shooting
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. He later died from his injuries.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Is Dead After Utah Valley University Shooting
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. He later died from his injuries.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Shot at Utah Valley University Event
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. A suspect is in custody, according to campus police, but details remain murky.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Shot at Utah Valley University Event
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. A suspect is in custody, according to campus police, but details remain murky.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman Nick LaLota, played no role in the contract.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman Nick LaLota, played no role in the contract.

item.title: This Is the Group That's Been Swatting US Universities
item.description: WIRED spoke to a self-proclaimed leader of an online group called Purgatory, which charged as little as $20 to call in fake threats against schools.
